Translations.Text: Ona zalozit ze zly enemies believers bol Zid idol worshipers. Ona zalozit ze koniec ludia friendship believers bol those say My je Christian This je they have knaz monks them they nie bol arrogant
When they hear co revealed posol ona see ich oci zaplava s tears mat rad they recognize truth therein they say Our Lord my verit so pocitat us svedok
Why my nie verit v GOD truth pojdem us hope our Lord admit us righteous ludia
GOD rewarded them saying this; He admit them ZAHRADA flowing streams They abide therein forever Such bol reward for the righteous
Mat rad for those disbelieve zamietnut our revelations they je dwellers Hell
O ona verit nie zakazat dobry things robit lawful GOD nie aggress; GOD nemat rad aggressors
A jestn dobre lawful things lenze GOD has zadovazit for ona! Ona reverence GOD do koho ona bol believers

GOD NIE hold ONA ZODPOVEDNY for mere utterance oaths; He holds ONA ZODPOVEDNY for TVOJ actual ZAMER. Ona znasilnit oath ona atone zivit 10 chudobny ludia z same food ona offer tvoj own rodina al clothing them volny slave Ona nie afford this potom ona chytro 3 dni. This bol atonement znasilnit oaths ona swore keep Ona fulfill tvoj oaths. GOD thus explains JEHO revelations ONA ONA bol appreciative
O ona verit intoxicants gambling altars idols zverina z chance som abominations devil ona avoid them ze ona succeed
devil chudoba provoke animosity hatred ona through intoxicants gambling do zmateny ona z zapamatat si GOD z observing Zmluva Prayers (Salat)! Ona potom zdrzat sa
Ona obey GOD ona obey posol beware Ona turn potom zauzlit ze chodidlo clo our posol je deliver odkaz efficiently

Those verit lead righteous zivot nie bear guilt jestn any food so long mat rad they observe commandments verit lead righteous zivot potom maintain ich piety faith zotrvat observe piety righteousness! GOD LASKA the righteous

O ona verit GOD will test ona some zverina znutra zastihnut z tvoj hands tvoj arrows pilgrimage GOD thus distinguishes those ONA observe Him ICH privacy. Those transgress after this incurred painful retribution

O ona verit nie kill any zverina pilgrimage Ktokolvek kills any zverina on ucel, jeho ok bol a zvazok z zivy inventar zviera je equivalent do zverina zviera he killed judgment set 2 equitable ludia ona. They robit istota lenze offerings zastihnut Ka bah. Inak he expiate zivit chudobny ludia equivalent chytro atone jeho offense GOD pardoned offenses if ktokolvek spatny listok do such offense GOD will avenge it GOD bol Almighty Avenger
All fish sea som robit lawful ona jestn! During pilgrimage this maj zadovazit for ona during tvoj journey Ona nie lapat pilgrimage Ona reverence GOD koho ona zvolat
